node.name: Eclipse Jubula Database Drivers
node.shortdescription:
If you are using the Jubula feature within Eclipse or are are working with the "Eclipse for Testers" package you have to install this feature to make additional database drivers and configuration settings available.

In addition to the standard H2 embedded database you can use Oracle, MySQL and Postgres with this feature.

Please be aware that BREDEX tests Jubula and GUIdancer with Oracle. The drivers for MySQL and Postgres are added with the status 'unsupported'. We have performed a basic test with Jubula and GUIdancer against these databases and know that there are customers that use them, but we do not include them in our regression tests.
node.body:
If you are using the Jubula feature within Eclipse or are are working with the "Eclipse for Testers" package you have to install this feature to make additional database drivers and configuration settings available.

In addition to the standard H2 embedded database you can use Oracle, MySQL and Postgres with this feature.

Please be aware that BREDEX tests Jubula and GUIdancer with Oracle. The drivers for MySQL and Postgres are added with the status 'unsupported'. We have performed a basic test with Jubula and GUIdancer against these databases and know that there are customers that use them, but we do not include them in our regression tests.
